bibl.note: Alexandria was not universally admired. The existence of the Potter's Oracle does well illustrate one reaction to the foundation of the city.
bibl.seg: THOMPSON Dorothy J., Alexandria: The City by the Sea.
Alexandrian Studies II in Honour of Mostafa el Abbadi = BSAA 46 (2001) pp. 73-79.
Alexandria was not universally admired. The existence of the Potter's Oracle does well illustrate one reaction to the foundation of the city.
